creator: dj02.net@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

When i installed an update from Windows Update: KB920342, Apache did'n start
anymore. Even i tried to start it manually, it crashed on starting. I had to
uninstall: KB920342 that Apache started.

I suggest you to not install: KB920342 (Optional Update in the Update site) from
the Windows Update.

My OS: Win XP Pro 5.1.2600 Finnish (SP 2), All other updates installed
Steffen's builded Apache 2.2.3

UPDATE: "Additional information about update:
http://support.microsoft.com/kb/KB920342")

creator: dj02.net@gmail.com
text: I builded Apache 2.2.3 binaries 14th of November 2006 gain and now it works.
